title: 820-2879 - woes
message:
Hello, have an 820-2879 no liquid damage - does not chime and does not start .
voltage @ q7085 fluctuates from 16.9 v down to 3.3volts and then back up again. as such, computer wont boot. power isnt stable @ u7200.
Replaced ISL6295 but no change, Checked Current limiting circuit and resistors/ caps , all check out fine. would love to see if this board is bootable or in the junk heap.
thanks

title: 820-2879 - woes
820-2879 - woes
message: WOW>. put alcohol on some suspect chips, u7500 fried. Changed and now voltage present and no more fluctuations. Now starts but no screen. no backlight no chime...

title: 820-2879 - woes
message:
USB mouse?
Do you get VCORE?
Changed DDR?
Tried any reset?

title: 820-2879 - woes
message: U7500 died and MCP core went high. Dead MCP is very likely.

title: 820-2879 - woes
message: but i have pp vcore, smc core , proper khz reading from RTC crystals? am i missing something here? i will replace this if you think that is what it is .

title: 820-2879 - woes
message:
trackpad disconnected
vcore present
changed ddr, 
tried pram and smc reset. nothing changed.

title: 820-2879 - woes
message: will change mcp and post when done.
